item.title: The Strongest Magician in the Demon Lord's Army Was a Human (Hindi Dub) - Episode 12 - General E Rudle
item.description: Ike arrives to save Cefiro, and uses a cunning plan and new weapons in his battle against the brilliant enemy general.

item.description: Ike arrives to save Cefiro, and uses a cunning plan and new weapons in his battle against the brilliant enemy general.

item.title: The Unwanted Undead Adventurer (English Dub) - Episode 11 - The Garden Labyrinth
item.description: Rentt makes his way through a complex maze, and its owner gives him his choice of magic item as a reward.

item.title: True Beauty (English Dub) - Episode 7 - So what If I like her?
item.description: After a successful first mission, Jugyeong decides to relax and help out Seojun with his part-time job at a festival. Everything is going well, until Suho shows up and a small plushie ignites a fierce battle between the two boys.

item.title: True Beauty (Portuguese Dub) - Episode 6 - This Too Shall Pass Away
item.description: With Suho slowly recovering from his accident, Jugyeong finds out what happened between him and Seojun. But she also has to keep up with her dance mission, which turns out to be harder than anticipated. Luckily, someone steps in to help her out.

item.title: True Beauty (French Dub) - Episode 6 - This Too Shall Pass Away
item.description: With Suho slowly recovering from his accident, Jugyeong finds out what happened between him and Seojun. But she also has to keep up with her dance mission, which turns out to be harder than anticipated. Luckily, someone steps in to help her out.

item.title: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian (French Dub) - Episode 7 - A Storm Arrives
item.description: Ayano confronts Masachika about his intentions to run against Yuki in the upcoming election. The student council throw a welcome party for their two new members where Masachika and Masha discuss their more hidden natures.

item.title: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian (Telugu Dub) - Episode 11 - An Unexpected Curtain-Raiser
item.description: The unexpected encounter at the parent-teacher meetings leaves Masachika weakened and sick, and more importantly, unaware of what's happening at school.

item.title: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian (Tamil Dub) - Episode 11 - An Unexpected Curtain-Raiser
item.description: The unexpected encounter at the parent-teacher meetings leaves Masachika weakened and sick, and more importantly, unaware of what's happening at school.

item.description: The unexpected encounter at the parent-teacher meetings leaves Masachika weakened and sick, and more importantly, unaware of what's happening at school.

item.title: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian (English Dub) - Episode 12 - Chin Up and Face Forward
item.description: The only thing standing between the student body and summer break is the closing ceremony, where Alya and Yuki will formally address their schoolmates and begin their official candidacy for student council president.

item.title: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian (German Dub) - Episode 11 - An Unexpected Curtain-Raiser
item.description: The unexpected encounter at the parent-teacher meetings leaves Masachika weakened and sick, and more importantly, unaware of what's happening at school.

item.title: KamiErabi GOD.app Season 2 - Episode 13 - That's Why It Needed God
True Beauty - Episode 9
The Prince of Tennis II U-17 WORLD CUP SEMIFINAL - Episode 1 - The Mightiest Germany: The Night Before the Match!
item.description: The Japanese team is resolutely preparing for the match against Germany, aiming to advance to the finals afterward. Captain Byodoin trusts his players, who do not give up despite this challenge.

item.title: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Season 3 - Episode 51 - Theatrical Malice
item.description: A year has passed since the battle at the Sanctuary, and Subaru has been spending fulfilling days united with Emilia's camp. However, his peaceful everyday life ends with the arrival of a single letter.

item.title: Acro Trip - Episode 1 - Beginning Encounter
item.description: Date Chizuko is a generally unenthusiastic seventh grader who's been sent to stay with her Grandfather. However, her life changes drastically when she becomes a superfan of the local magical girl and is approached by her nemesis.

item.title: Acro Trip - Episode 2 - Go To the Path of Evil
item.description: Chizuko and Kuroma are fronted by a knife-wielding robber at the convenience store. Berry Blossom may, or may not, come to their rescue.

item.title: A Herbivorous Dragon of 5,000 Years Gets Unfairly Villainized Season 2 - Episode 2 - Episode 2
item.description: The appearance of another evil dragon spreads panic in Asga. In the midst of the confusion, Reiko and the dragon meet the ruler of the kingdom.

item.title: A Herbivorous Dragon of 5,000 Years Gets Unfairly Villainized Season 2 - Episode 1 - Wecome to Asga!
item.description: Reiko and her dragon companion travel to the Kingdom of Asga. There, they are welcomed by General Edward and his troops—friendly... or?

item.title: A Herbivorous Dragon of 5,000 Years Gets Unfairly Villainized Season 2 (Japanese Audio) - Episode 1 - Welcome to Asga!
item.description: Reiko and her dragon companion travel to the Kingdom of Asga. There, they are welcomed by General Edward and his troops—friendly... or?

item.title: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Director's Cut (French Dub) - Episode 13 - The Self-Proclaimed Knight and the Greatest Knight \ That's All This Story Is About
item.description: Emilia tried to warn the villagers of Arlam that danger was coming and they should evacuate, but was not well-received. As she's pondering what more she can do, Wilhelm arrives at the mansion with a message... Subaru and Julius face off against Betelgeuse's Unseen Hand. However, as one Unseen Hand after another is launched their way, the two heroes find themselves completely on the defensive.

item.title: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Director's Cut (French Dub) - Episode 12 - A Flash of Sloth \ Nefarious Sloth
item.description: The half of the mercenary army that had been blocking the road during the White Whale subjugation returns to join the main force. Subaru then leads the way into the forest of the Mathers domain, hoping to find and destroy the Witch's Cult before they can learn of the subjugating army's movements. Subaru and his companions head toward Roswaal's mansion to evacuate Emilia and all the others there, stopping at the nearby village on the way and beginning to evacuate its residents as well. However, the situation takes a turn that nobody expected...

item.title: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Director's Cut (French Dub) - Episode 11 - Wilhelm van Astrea \ A Wager That Defies Despair
item.description: Subaru has devoted everything he had, and done all he could do. His passion has captured Crusch's heart, as well as Anastasia's cooperation, and they all enter into the battle against the White Whale together. Subaru and Rem lose all words at the sight unfolding above them. Just when it seemed they would soon have the White Whale cornered, despite the sacrifices it took to reach that point, the battle takes a turn that no one expected.

item.title: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Director's Cut (French Dub) - Episode 10 - From Zero \ Battle Against the White Whale
item.description: Subaru laments that he could not do anything or save anyone, and has no options left. Exhausted, he suddenly takes off running at full speed as if he's made a decision... To save Emilia, Subaru approaches Crusch to negotiate the formation of an alliance. His terms are a bit difficult for Crusch to believe, but she can see that Subaru isn't lying.

item.title: No Longer Allowed in Another World (Hindi Dub) - Episode 10 - Reflect on Your Failure to Kill Me Properly
item.description: Sensei's party is drawn into a war between the church, the dwarves, and the Fallen Angel of Misery. They are fortunate to have the great wizard Wolff on their side until a young woman shows up...

item.title: No Longer Allowed in Another World (Tamil Dub) - Episode 10 - Reflect on Your Failure to Kill Me Properly
item.description: Sensei's party is drawn into a war between the church, the dwarves, and the Fallen Angel of Misery. They are fortunate to have the great wizard Wolff on their side until a young woman shows up...

item.title: No Longer Allowed in Another World (Telugu Dub) - Episode 10 - Reflect on Your Failure to Kill Me Properly
item.description: Sensei's party is drawn into a war between the church, the dwarves, and the Fallen Angel of Misery. They are fortunate to have the great wizard Wolff on their side until a young woman shows up...

item.title: No Longer Allowed in Another World (English Dub) - Episode 10 - Reflect on Your Failure to Kill Me Properly
item.description: Sensei's party is drawn into a war between the church, the dwarves, and the Fallen Angel of Misery. They are fortunate to have the great wizard Wolff on their side until a young woman shows up...

item.title: TASUKETSU -Fate of the Majority- - Episode 12 - The Key
item.description: Raion comes face to face with Gobo and learns of the group's battle and victory against the former Emperor. But the Queen finally begins making her move to dethrone them, putting Gobo and the entire group at risk...

item.title: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister - Episode 1 - The Miracle Begins
item.description: A young man begins a new life at Amagami shrine, and meets the three sisters who live there.

item.title: I'll Become a Villainess Who Goes Down in History - Episode 1 - The Villainess and Working Out
item.description: "Without effort, there's no reward! This applies to aspiring villainesses as well. With that in mind, Alicia wants to train not only her mind but also her body from a young age. Because only then can she ultimately come closer to her ideal."

item.title: Log Horizon 2 (Hindi Dub) - Episode 18 - When the Concert Ends
item.description: Dareila joins the party at the Boxurt mountains, and the group stops at the town of Saphir. Isuzu learns that the reason the land people enjoy her songs so much is because the world only has 42 songs in total. She gets very sad and stays in her room, but then a giant flock of wyverns descend upon the town.

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 12 - The Sacred Place
item.description: As a string of criminals, cops, and assassins converge on his building, the Corpse God finally decides to take action. How far will the necromancer go to defend his new home? And what new attention will his actions draw in a world without magic?

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 11 - The Beginning
item.description: While everyone scrambles to discover the secret of the emblem, Polka receives an unexpected visitor. The modern world's most dangerous individuals are starting to realize that the fortune teller is more than he appears.

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 10 - The Emblem
item.description: Solitaire fills the skies of Shinjuku with blimps—all marked with the emblem of the Corpse God's home country! What is a symbol from another world doing in modern Japan, and who will take the magician's bait?

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 9 - The Signpost
item.description: Inspector Iwanome pressures Polka into reading his fortune. What does the inspector hope to gain, and what will he do when the reading dredges up secrets from his past? Meanwhile, the date of the Phantom Solitaire's "performance" is fast approaching.

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 8 - The Assassin
item.description: Polka is about to resume business as usual when he gets two unexpected houseguests: his niece Sayo and her bodyguard! Do the pair just need a place to crash, or is something more sinister at play? And Inspector Iwanome is still on Polka's track.

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 7 - The Magician
item.description: The Shinoyama family is out of danger, but the Corpse God still needs to explain himself to Polka's father, Rozan! How will the gruff tycoon react to his youngest son's fate? Meanwhile, an eccentric criminal stages a jailbreak.

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 6 - The Firestarter
item.description: Keeping his promise to a ghost, Polka returns to his family's mansion with Misaki in tow. Can the necromancer fool the people who know the real Polka best? And can he save them from an unknown threat without arousing their suspicions?

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 5 - The Monster
item.description: Just when he thought the cops were bad enough, Polka comes face to face with Lemmings, Shinjuku's most legendary criminal. Will Polka reveal his necromancy to save his new friends? And will his powers even be enough to save them if he does?

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 4 - The Mad Dog
item.description: Polka's recent activities have caught the eye of a police unit dedicated to hunting down the most bizarre and seemingly superhuman offenders. To a peace-seeking necromancer, these cops could be worse trouble than the criminals he's fallen in with!

item.title: Dead Mount Death Play (Thai Dub) - Episode 3 - The Necromancer
item.description: Polka is settling into his new life when a man arrives begging Misaki to save him from gangsters. Polka sends her with him, but the job isn't what it seems. Meanwhile, other factions in Shinjuku investigate Polka's role in the fire.
